publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3458 Brian Adam: Piping Scotland Homeâ€”That the Parliament recognises the great achievements of the novice juvenile band of Bucksburn and District Pipe Band, Aberdeen, in its 25th anniversary year, including its crowning as champion of champions after winning four out of five major championship competitions, including the world title, and further recognises the great contribution that Scottish pipe bands make in representing our culture internationally in the Year of Homecoming 2009.
S3M-3458 Piping Scotland Home (lodged on 16 February 2009) Jamie Hepburn*

S3M-3458 Piping Scotland Home (lodged on 16 February 2009) Sandra White*, Bob Doris*, Alasdair Allan*, Rob Gibson*, Kenneth Gibson*, Christina McKelvie*, Angela Constance*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Bill Kidd*
